title: Pack of 3 Lint Rollers - 91 Sheets sticky Lint Roller for Clothes with Replacement Head, Lint Remover Ideal for All Fabrics, 27cm x 11.3cm x 4.9cm, Effective on Dust, Dirt, Fluff, Hair and Debris
features: PREMIUM-GRADE - These sticky rollers are easy to apply and they leave no residue on the surfaces. The roller is suitable for use with all fabric types, but extra care should be taken when applying it near delicate items because of their sensitivity.

EASY PEEL FORMULA - These easy peel sticky roller for clothes are made with a unique spiral-wound design that allows for 360-degree rotation even when under pressure. The handle on this product ensures ease in handling and smooth movement throughout your day.

REFILL AND REUSE - With our refillable system, there's no more worrying about running out and having an incomplete roll. Just insert the new roll onto your ergonomic lint rollers for pet hair and use as needed. Make sure that when it is time to replace both rolls together in order not have any gaps or leftover pieces between them.

MUST-HAVE ACCESSORY - Lint rollers are a great alternative to expensive upholstery cleaners and hoovers because they can remove all sorts of dirt, fluff, fur--even glitter. These reusable lint roller come ready with enough adhesive strip for removing even the most stubborn stains so you won’t have trouble keeping things looking clean.

EARTH-FRIENDLY OPTION - Our roller for clothes is unlike any other battery-powered device as it operates manually and does not require power. With one refill head included in the set, your carbon footprint will be kept to minimum with this earth-friendly option!
description: Product Description Effortless Lint Removal – Enjoy Hair & Dust-Free Surfaces in Seconds! The Last Lint Roller You'll Ever Need - Works on Curtains, Clothes, Furniture & More! Deep-Clean Your Carpets Like Never Before - The Ultimate Sticky Lint Roller Love Your Pet, Not the Mess - Effortless Hair Removal After Cuddle Time Keep Your Car Spotless - Effortless Lint & Hair Removal for Travelers Curtains Carpet Cloths Car Trunk 91-Ultra Sticky Sheets - Effective Lint Rollers for All Fabrics -Effortless Cleaning, Exceptional Results Upgrade your cleaning routine with this value pack of high-performance lint rollers. Each pack contains a handle with a roller of 49 sheets and two extra refills of 21 sheets each- a total of 91 ultra-sticky sheets that instantly remove: ✓ Stubborn pet hair ✓ Embedded lint ✓ Dust ✓ Debris -360° Spiral-Wound Advantage • Easy Peel Technology – No messy adhesive transfer • Full-Rotation Cleaning – Reaches every angle effortlessly • Quick-Sheet Replacement – Change rolls in seconds -Smarter, Sustainable Cleaning: ✔ Refillable & Reusable – Reduces waste vs. disposable rollers ✔ Battery-Free Operation – Eco-friendly manual use -Multi-Surface Mastery: Perfect for: • Fresh-looking curtains & upholstery • Pristine clothing & formal wear • Spotless car seats & pet beds • Travel-ready touch-ups
